# 4. Cloning, Revival, and Ghost Roles
- After cloning, respawning, or taking a ghost role, you must follow the new life rule. - If cloned, resuscitated, or respawned, you don't have amnesia, but you can only recall vague details of who or what had killed you. - If taking a ghost role, you have no memories from any past lives for the duration of playing as a ghost role. - Don't act on anything you saw while ghosted. - A 15 minute non-aggression period is required after respawning, so you canâ€™t immediately get in a ship and try to go kill whoever killed you.
